And user is on login page # stepDefinition.LoginSteps.user_is_on_login_page() When user enters username and password # stepDefinition.LoginSteps.user_enters_username_and_password() And user clicks on login # stepDefinition.LoginSteps.user_clicks_on_login() Then user is navigated to the home page # stepDefinition.LoginSteps.user_is_navigated_to_the_home_page()
